CustomField.description: Manually entered for stock gifts. Captures the average price of the share (i.e. average of "stock price high" and "stock price low" fields). Used for calculating "Stock Receivable" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Manually entered for stock gifts. Captures the average price of the share (i.e. average of "stock price high" and "stock price low" fields). Used for calculating "Stock Receivable" field.
CustomField.label: Average Stock Price
